scripts.build: npm run build:html && npm run build:css
scripts.watch:html: npm run build:html && chokidar 'src/**/*.pug' -c 'npm run build:html'
scripts.watch:css: npm run build:css && chokidar 'src/**/*.scss' -c 'npm run build:css'
scripts.watch: npm run build && npm-run-all --parallel watch:html watch:css
scripts.release: rm -rf cv && mkdir -p cv && npm run build && cp -r dist/* cv/ && echo $(date '+%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S') > cv/changelog.txt
